EmailTemplate.name: Partial Removal Started
EmailTemplate.subject: {!FS_Execution_Plan__c.FS_Type_of_Removal__c} Removal Initiated
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
A {!FS_Execution_Plan__c.FS_Type_of_Removal__c} removal request to remove Freestyle dispenser(s) has been initiated. Please take appropriate action to ensure product, linkage, indicator setup, removal execution and assess management procedures are adhered to..
Click this link https://freestyle.my.salesforce.com to open the FET site. Then click {!FS_Execution_Plan__c.Link} to be directed to the specific record referenced above.
